description: From anti- +â€Ž venom, q.v. Doublet of antivenin and antivenene.

entries.meaning: (medicine) A medicine that counteracts venom, an antidote to biological poisons from venomous animals such as snakes and spiders.
examples: So how much venom do you actually need to make antivenom?About 15.15 snakes to make one vial of antivenom?Yep.
